#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{int t,i,p;
cin>>t;
while (t--)
{char s[101];
scanf("%s",&s);
p=0;
for (i=0;s[i]!='\0';i++)
{if ((s[i]=='a')||(s[i]=='e')||(s[i]=='i')||(s[i]=='o')||(s[i]=='u')||(s[i]=='A')||(s[i]=='E')||(s[i]=='I')||(s[i]=='O')||(s[i]=='U'))
{p=1; break;}}
if (p==1)
cout<<"yes"<<endl;
else cout<<"no"<<endl;}
return 0;}
